name: Rogue Repulser
description: War has plagued the future world of Avalon in this top down 8 bit style bullet hell. Crawl, the last ancient master Repulsor has laid siege to castle Camelot and single-handedly overthrown the king. He now possesses the most powerful sword on earth, Excalibur, and the crown. He aims to use his new found power to conquer the 7 realms of Avalon and enslave its people. But alas a small glimmer of hope in the form of a young girl has risen from the ashes to lead a rebellion that will topple an empire. This young hero has somehow learned the ancient art of Repulsor and aims to use it to take down Crawl.
